title: Whereas there has been a horrid and detestable conspiracy formed and carried on by papists and other wicked and traiterous persons for assassinating His Majesties royal person
author: Leverett, John.
notes: A declaration of support for William III against the followers of James II.
Signed in manuscript: John Leverett, Samuel Layman, Thomas Browne, Jam.s Converse.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
